wikipedia_page.main: Charles Woolley Shepherd (27 February 1887 – 31 July 1968) was a Welsh field hockey player, born in Barbados, who competed in the 1908 Summer Olympics with the Welsh team, which won the bronze medal.

response: *Charles Shepherd (character), a character in Ice, a Christian science fiction novel

*Charles Shepherd (field hockey) (1887–1968), Welsh field hockey player
